entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with a few rain showers in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023
